title: CHAPPUIS HALDER & CO.
text: Automating the Greater China sales dashboard on Power BI, Conducted an IT assessment framework, Authored and designed the Project Inthanon-LionRock Phase 1 report.

title: SYMPHONY
text: Assisted in planning the regional sales pipelines by formulating strategies for industry-wide adoption and prioritizing goals of key market players.

title: ANGEL INVESTMENT NETWORK INDONESIA
text: Attracted 100+ website visits per day within the launch week of Connector, Curated the press release and marketing plan for Connector.ID.
